data.introduce: 国际变更费存储接口，用于国际变更费计算后，运价写入PNR进行存储功能，对应黑屏DFSR指令。
data.functions: 该接口用于国际变更费存储。即国际变更费计算后，运价写入PNR的操作，对应黑屏DFSR指令，接口请求参数依赖于国际变更费自动计算返回结果，因此前序接口是【C38-国际变更费自动计算（新版）-AirIntlReprice】或者【C54-国际按PNR变更费计算-AirIntlRepriceByPNR】。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirIntlRepriceIntoPNRRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国际变更费存储请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PNR","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"FareParameters","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价列表信息","children":[{"name":"FareParameter","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价信息","children":[{"name":"PsgIndex","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客序号","children":[]},{"name":"SerialNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价序列号","children":[]},{"name":"FareIndex","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"需要录入的运价编号","children":[]},{"name":"PassNameForCheck","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"需要校验的旅客姓名","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"SegToDeletes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段序号列表信息","children":[{"name":"SegToDelete","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段序号信息","children":[{"name":"Index","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"需要删除的航段序号","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirIntlRepriceIntoPNRRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国际变更费存储响应","children":[{"name":"PNR","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office permission denied ","msgZh":" Office 没有权限 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":" -304 ","name":null,"msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快,请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -305 ","name":null,"msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":" -306 ","name":null,"msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":" -311 ","name":null,"msg":" time out, please try again later ","msgZh":" 操作超时，请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -390 ","name":null,"msg":" IBE Service Error ","msgZh":" IBE服务异常 "},{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -400 ","name":null,"msg":" format of xml string is not valid ","msgZh":" xml内容格式错误 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" Input error! ","msgZh":" 输入参数出错 "}]
